attributes.action: Restore civil liberties that have been eroded over the years
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We would like to have more freedom to move about without cctv, speed cameras, and everything else we seem to want to do not being taxed, fined, or reprimanded for.
We have less civil liberties now than Soviet Union civilians had when they were under communism.
We understand the need to keep trouble makers to a minimum, but surely our movments shouldnt be monitored 24/7
